group_1.textRight: However, if that will be the case,@is there nothing else you could propose?

group_1.textLeft: Just a reminder that we're here too, nyaa.

group_1.textRight: We didn't come here just to listen.

group_1.textLeft: Touka, Nemu.
You mean you have a method to strike a deal?

group_1.textRight: Something like that.
Then lastly, we'll hear from the former Magius.

group_1.textLeft: It won't be something complex, okay?
Right, it's plain and simple.

group_1.narration: ーHikaruー@What do you mean by this?
ーNemuー@So you're aware of these then.@We Magius are the cause for Futatsugi's suffering.
ーNemuー@It will be difficult for us to arrange for Alina's share,@but we can offer ours right in front of you.
ーSakuyaー@So, what do you want us to do?
ーToukaー@You're pretty dim, huh.@You should use your head properly.
ーSakuyaー@What, are you calling me stupid?
ーToukaー@Yep, you can destroy our soul gems@with all of your anger.
ーNemuー@Even the kind Yuna Kureha should be able to kill@us war criminals without a pang of conscience.

group_1.textRight: Wha...

group_1.textLeft: What are you two saying!?

group_1.textRight: Didn't Sister just say something outrageous too?
For us, this will be the last resort.

group_1.textLeft: Weren't you talking to Kagome, though...?
If you two aren't here...@to spread the word about Magical Girls...!

group_1.textRight: It would be better to give up our lives@if it means saving Magical Girls in the future.

group_1.textLeft: That includes all of the Magical Girls@in front of us too.

group_1.textRight: As Big Sis said, this is our shortcut to strike a deal.
I don't think there is another way@to satisfy Promised Blood.
...This is a surprise.

group_1.textLeft: When you're ruthless with your own life,@this is a natural decision.

group_1.textRight: Hikaru,@is it okay if we take this matter back to them...?

group_1.textLeft: These people are risking their lives,@but we can't give 'em an answer here...

group_1.textRight: So for now, we'll wait for the eldest sister's reply.

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind at all.
I'll also leave the judgement up to you.
Hey, you two have some kind of strategy, right...?
Are you perhaps using your position@to show good faith...?

group_1.textRight: It's better if we do.
Naturally,@we have to calculate our own sacrifice into this.

group_1.textLeft: I understand your reasoning,@but that's not something I can forgive...!

group_1.textRight: But a half-hearted shake up wouldn't make sense,@you know?

group_1.textLeft: E-even so, I...!

group_1.textRight: It's useless to try to stop us, Big Sis,@if you're going to "save the many".
We're still only proposing things,@so let's continue talking about it...
Is there anything else left@to be used for negotiations?

group_1.textLeft: You really, really can't let Touka and Nemu...
Nemu and I are only talking about it now.

group_1.textRight: I think what we mentioned is the best proposal.

group_1.textLeft: Then, this will be the end of discussion.

group_1.textRight: You'll have to wait a little until we get a reply.
By now, the eldest sister should be fighting@the [textYellow:Kimochi].

group_1.textLeft: Well then, do we just wait here for a while?
If there's spare time,@'sit okay if I go shopping?
There's a famous ice cream shop here, so I wanna get some for the eldest sister before going home.

group_1.textRight: What? If I'm the only one here it'll be awkward.@Besides, do you even know where it is?

group_1.textLeft: I can just look it up.
You can leave seperately if you want.@We'll be waiting here.

group_1.textRight: You know, Hikaru...
Hikaru?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing, it's just hard to actually find on a map...

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Um, [wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:motion_100][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]then maybe I could guide you to it...?

group_1.textRight: You can't possibly be in the mood to do that when@your companions are risking their lives...

group_1.textLeft: I'm more worried about staying still.
With Touka and Nemu trying to connect us together,
I think I'd rather be moving@so that's not put to waste...

group_1.textRight: I don't want to go shopping@with this terrible feeling...
But, Iroha is owed gratitude today, so it's fine...
Either way, you don't know where the store is.
Well, we are tentatively dead,@so if you'll excuse us from here.

group_1.textCenter: We have other things to do.

group_1.textLeft: Sure...
